column1: Funeral services will be held at 10:30 a.m. on Wednesday
column4: at Legrand Friends Church in Legrand
column5: Iowa. Visitation will be from 5:00 to 7:00 p.m. on Tuesday June 16
column7: at the Mitchell Family Funeral Home in Marshalltown
column8: Iowa. In honor of Bob please dress casual. Memorials may be directed to the family to be designated at a later date.
